item.title: Dating apps and attacks on gay men
item.description: Reporter Josh Taylor speaks to Tamsin Rose about concerns some anti-LGBTQ+ people online are promoting ‘methods of attack’ and how men are being targeted after agreeing to meetings via apps such as Grindr Feed: https://www.theguardian.com/australia-news/series/full-story/podcast.xml

item.title: Podcast This Escape - Break This Game
item.description:
We talk with Matt about his virtual reality escape room.
Check out the images and write up for this Escape Room below to follow along, or play yourself! https://www.consumethismedia.com/break
For everything Escape This Podcast, head to https://www.consumethismedia.com/escape-this-podcast To hang out with us and other fans, join our discord here: https://discord... Feed: https://feed.podbean.com/www.escapethispodcast.com/feed.xml
